title: Physical Therapist Assistant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Brooks Rehabilitation
Interview Descriptions: I was Called in for interview after about a week and it was a pleasant experience so far. The office manager seemed knowledgeable and kind. Interview questions were standard and got a tour of the office.
Interview Questions: What’s the best thing about your previous jobs?

title: Intake Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Brooks Rehabilitation (Jacksonville, FL) in Dec 2022
Interview Descriptions: I had two interviews back to back which were pretty fine, each person just repeated what the other one said and I was told I would be told whether or not I would be moving forward, I emailed and called a week later and never received a response
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself? Why Brooks? Whys you leave your most current position? Behavorial questions

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Brooks Rehabilitation (Jacksonville, FL) in Oct 2022
Interview Descriptions: You are contact by the HR recruiter. Talk with you about the position, salary, sign bonus and available shifts. The second interview is with the manager, she is friendly and talk about your nurse experience, Hospital policies and job description. 2-3 days later your received the documents to complete the background. When the background it’s ready, you will be receiving the start date. Easy process and friendly!
Interview Questions: How is you experience, level education, years in the profession, great and bad experiences, abilities, system experiences?

title: HR Business Partner Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Brooks Rehabilitation
Interview Descriptions: Four interviews in one day to include a lunch meal interview.  All of this after the initial phone interview and additional interview with HR Manager.  Long Process. They should probably not do the lunch interview, sends mixed signals to the future employee.
Interview Questions:
How long have you been in the HR field?
Are you familiar with the healthcare setting?

title: Human Resources Assistant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Brooks Rehabilitation
Interview Descriptions: Phone interview was first. Asked standard questions about what you know about brooks and standard questions regarding experience and scenarios. Said they would follow up never heard back. Entry level position and pay but wanted mid level experience.
Interview Questions: What do you know about brooks rehabilitation.

title: Manager Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Brooks Rehabilitation
Interview Descriptions:
1) phone interview with recruiter from HR
2) interview with hiring manager 
3) panel interview 

Lengthy interviewing process - took approximately one month from start to finish prior to offer. However, standard interview questions and everyone was nice
Interview Questions: What do you know about Brooks?

title: Manager Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Brooks Rehabilitation
Interview Descriptions: First I had an interview with a recruiter who asked basic questions. Invited in for a second interview which was a panel interview with the team I would be working with. Received offer 1.5 weeks later.
Interview Questions: What drew you to this position?

title: Certified Occupational Therapist Assistant (COTA) Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Brooks Rehabilitation (Tallahassee, FL) in Mar 2021
Interview Descriptions: This company did amazing getting ahold of me to set up an interview! The process was simple and they were very straightforward and to the point!I am looking forward to continuing the process and hopefully joining the team!
Interview Questions: What makes you want to work here? How did you find out about us?

title: Exercise Physiologist Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Brooks Rehabilitation (Jacksonville, FL) in Sept 2020
Interview Descriptions: Group interview with the manager, lead PT, and Personal Trainer. Overall went well and asked STAR questions. Example: What’s the most difficult situation you’ve been in and how did you handle it?
Interview Questions: What your strengths and weaknesses?

title: Payroll Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Brooks Rehabilitation (Jacksonville, FL) in Aug 2020
Interview Descriptions: Zoom interview with two associates. One seemed very clinical, the other friendly. Was then told it would be a three week or so process. Was more than qualified for the position but never received a call back.
Interview Questions: Do you prefer doing things alone or on a team?

title: Administrative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Brooks Rehabilitation (Jacksonville, FL) in Aug 2019
Interview Descriptions: Applied online. Was emailed asking if I was interested in interviewing for the position. Set up a date and time for the interview. Had a panel interview with two of my potential co-workers.
Interview Questions: What did I know about the organization?

title: Licensed Practical Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Brooks Rehabilitation (Jacksonville, FL) in Jul 2019
Interview Descriptions: There were two people during the interview. It was pretty relaxed. They gave information on the job and asked questions on how You would go about dealing with certain situations.
Interview Questions: Give an example of a time where you went above and beyond for a patient.

title: IT Staff Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Brooks Rehabilitation (Jacksonville, FL) in Jan 2019
Interview Descriptions: The interview process is a multi-stage process for hiring new employees. The interview process typically includes the following steps: scheduling interviews, conducting preliminary interviews, conducting in-person interviews, following up with candidates and making a hire.
Interview Questions: IT technical questions, related to protocols and applications

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Brooks Rehabilitation (Jacksonville, FL) in Nov 2018
Interview Descriptions: The interview was brief and accurate. The interviewer was kind. I first got a phone call from the recruiter then I had a one on one conversation with the director of nursing.
Interview Questions: How would you manage your time?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Brooks Rehabilitation in Sept 2017
Interview Descriptions: Fairly easy and very straightforward . Not intimidating or arduous. Nice down to earth staff and management. Multicultural and accepting good place for gaining experience. A good place to work.
Interview Questions:
What attracted you to our facility?
What is your background?

title: Interviewee Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Brooks Rehabilitation (Jacksonville, FL) in Dec 2016
Interview Descriptions: it was more than one interview long. I met with the hiring manager and then I met the supervisor in the second interview who was over the department. They made the interview kind of awkward. Just try to act natural
Interview Questions: what is one of my weaknesses?

title: Controller Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Brooks Rehabilitation
Interview Descriptions: Very standard questions, lacked ability to ask insightful questions to determine your capabilities. A Senior positions such as this requires ability to manage people and skills need for that role. None of these type questions were asked. Not sure if the hiring manager knew what they were looking for in the position. After the interview a few weeks later received calls from two different recruiters for the position
Interview Questions: Standard technical questions specific to Brooks Rehabilitation. Background questions were related to your experience and how they map into this position.

title: Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Brooks Rehabilitation (Jacksonville, FL) in Feb 2016
Interview Descriptions: It was brief and I got a good sense of the company and what the culture entailed and decided if it was the right fit for me and it was because they were pleasant to me.
Interview Questions: Why do you want this job

title: H Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Brooks Rehabilitation (Jacksonville, FL) in Sept 2015
Interview Descriptions: Fast response to my application submitted online. Recruiter called and screened me. The manager called within 3 days. They really put you through the paces. Took two different assessment tests. All done within 2 weeks to get the offer.
Interview Questions: N/A

title: Physical Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Brooks Rehabilitation (Daytona Beach, FL) in Aug 2013
Interview Descriptions: Attended an open "job fair" and found the administrative presence very welcoming.  Spoke via telephone to at least two contact persons from human resources department following the "job fair", and eventually was contacted for phone interview by interim department manager.  All contact was professional and courteous.
Interview Questions: All questions were straight forward.  One of the contact persons asked for my lowest salary expectation/"deal-breaker" figure.  I was a little surprised that the question came up so early and via phone call.
